wafom



double wafom(R)(R P);
Compute wafom of a general quasi-Monte Carlo point set.

Algorithm:
Equation (4.2) of wafom-arxiv.
  • input P = (x[n] : 0 <= n < bm) in [0..1)s.
  • return sum[x in P](prod[i in s][j in m](1+(-1)x[i,j]2-j-1)-1) / |P|.


Params:
P an array-of-integral-type range which has attributes precision and dimensionF2. If v is an output vector, v*2-precision is an element of [0..2m)s.

Remarks:
Using double, precision > 54 is no better than precision = 54.
